value: About Chairman Hwang Kyo-ahn | Freedom & Innovation Party
Introduction to Chairman Hwang Kyo-ahn and Freedom & Innovation Party. Learn about our founding background
New Politics through Liberal Democracy and Innovation
We present the core values we pursue and the direction for their realization.
We firmly crack down on anti-state forces threatening liberal democracy and strengthen national security.
We defend and advance the liberal democratic system that is Korea's founding principle.
We build transparent and fair election systems to protect democracy.
We create a society where fairness and justice thrive.
We provide unlimited opportunities for young people and pioneer the future together.
We lead the 4th Industrial Revolution and create an innovative future.
Korea currently faces a crisis due to incomplete government oversight
Repeated manipulation allegations since the April 15
Election manipulation attempts by anti-state forces colluding with leftist groups
Serious crisis of the liberal democratic system
Outraged patriotic forces founded Freedom & Innovation to fight against this great evil and protect our system.
Root out election fraud cartels and establish fair election systems
Eliminate anti-state forces and strengthen government oversight systems
Realize free unification of Korea and build a global powerhouse
We aim to become a first-class political nation leading the era of the 4th Industrial Revolution.
Liberating North Korean people to achieve peace across the Eurasian continent as a unified nation
Discovering and implementing innovative policies to lead cutting-edge industries like AI
Boldly employing talented individuals regardless of region or field to contribute to national development

column3: fostering K-content to become a global cultural powerhouse

value: Becoming a first-class nation through free unification and achieving G2 global power status
Join Us in Defending Liberal Democracy
We will work together with all who support Freedom & Innovation against anti-state forces to protect our liberal democratic system.
We are waiting for talented and passionate people to build Korea's future together with Freedom & Innovation.
